attributes.action: Stop the council taking over health care services and laying off health visitors
attributes.additional_details: This is happening on the quiet people they will stop all home visits and you will have to make an appointment for weighings and any other issues regarding your children
attributes.background: There will be only one health visitor for the entire dearne area working under her or him will be underqualified support workers. Many people depend on this service for help and guidance this must not be cut

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of your local council. The local council responsible for the Dearne Valley in South Yorkshire is Barnsley Metropolitan Borough Council. You can contact them using the details here: https://www.barnsley.gov.uk/services/contact-us/

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
